Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark due to a street blockage at Wrigley Field.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark due to a street blockage at Wrigley Field.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Normal Blue Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays after a train was removed from service at Damen due to a door problem. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays after a train was removed from service at Damen due to a door problem on the train. Service is resuming.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Buffalo/88th
ShortDescription: Eastbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Mackinaw, 89th, and Buffalo due to, construction near Buffalo/88th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Mackinaw, 89th, and Buffalo due to, construction near Buffalo/88th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
